title: Is the Harry Potter series studied at school? If yes, in what grade? Which book is studied? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, it is not studied. However, it may be used in class, For example, in high school we had to do summer reading, and often Harry Potter was one of the choices. We had to meet with a group of people who read the same book as us and discuss it. But the Harry Potter series isn’t formally studied in any grade.
Not that I know of. I know kids read it recreationally (I was one of them), and even to this day kids are discovering the magic. But as far as it being a set text for school, I doubt it.
